presentationColumns.name: # of Expired Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The total Expired Opportunity Revenue Lines with atleast one Competitor
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.# of Expired Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Expected Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Expected Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Expected Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Open Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Open Opportunity Line Revenue (Revenue Status = Open)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Open Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Won Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Won Opportunity Line Revenue (Revenue Status = Won)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Won Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Lost Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Lost Opportunity Line Revenue (Revenue Status = Lost)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Lost Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: No Sale Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total No Sale Opportunity Line Revenue (Revenue Status = No Sale)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.No Sale Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Opportunity Line Split Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Opportunity Line Split Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Opportunity Line Split Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Expired Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Expired Opportunity Line Revenue (status = Open and Current Date greater than Expected Close date for Revenue Line)
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Expired Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Line Conversion Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Revenue Line conversion rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines/# of Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Revenue Line Conversion Rate

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Line Won Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Revenue Line Win rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines/# of Won+Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Revenue Line Won Rate

presentationColumns.name: Revenue Line Loss Rate
presentationColumns.description: The Revenue Line Loss rate. This metric is computed as follows: 100 * # of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines/# of Won+Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Revenue Line Loss Rate

presentationColumns.name: Average Won Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The average Won Opportunity Line Revenue. This metric is computed as follows: Won Opportunity Line Revenue/# of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Average Won Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The average age of the Won Opportunity Revenue Lines. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Won Revenue Line Close Date - Won Revenue Line Created Date))/# of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Average Age of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Won Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The average age of the Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Lost Revenue Line Close Date - Lost Revenue Line Created Date))/# of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Average Age of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Lost Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The average age of the No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines. This metric is computed as follows: sum(No Sale Revenue Line Close Date - No Sale Revenue Line Created Date))/# of No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Average Age of No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Average Age of Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The average age of the  Opportunity Revenue Lines. This metric is computed as follows: sum(Won/Lost/No Sale Revenue Line Close Date - Won/Lost/No Sale Revenue Line Created Date))/# of Won+Lost+No Sale Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Average Age of Opportunity Revenue Lines

localization.localizationKey: Average Age of Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Average # of Days Open
presentationColumns.description: The average number of days an Opportunity Revenue Line is Open. This metric is computed as follows: (Current Date - Open Opportunity Revenue Line Creation Date)/# of Open Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Average # of Days Open

presentationColumns.name: # of Raw Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.description: The total Raw Opportunity Revenue Lines
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.# of Raw Opportunity Revenue Lines

presentationColumns.name: Raw Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Raw Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Raw Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency

presentationColumns.name: Weighted Open Opportunity Line Revenue
presentationColumns.description: The total Weighted Opportunity Line Revenue. This metric is computed as follows: Open Opportunity Revenue * Win Probability
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Opportunity Revenue Line.Weighted Open Opportunity Line Revenue in CX Currency
